Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassRoom, HostelRoom
    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simulates a generic room. Assume that each room is a cuboid

      • Room

        public Room​(int length,
            int breadth,
            int height,
            int broken_lights,
            int broken_fans,
            int broken_tables)
     throws InvalidDimensionException,
            InvalidBrokenAppliances
        Constructor for Room. Initialize the instance variables
        Parameters:
        length - An integer equal to the length of the room
        breadth - An integer equal to the breadth of the room
        height - An integer equal to the height of the room
        no_of_broken_lights - An integer equal to number of broken lights in the room
        no_of_broken_fans - An integer equal to number of broken fans in the room
        no_of_broken_tables - An integer equal to number of broken tables in the room
        Throws:
        InvalidDimensionException
        InvalidBrokenAppliances

    • Method Detail

      • calculateRepairingCost

        public int calculateRepairingCost()
        Calculates the repairing cost of the generic room i.e. is independent of the type of room. Repairing cost is 1*(number of broken lights in the room) + 2 * (number of broken fans in the room) + 3 * (number of broken tables in the room)
        Returns:
        [description]
